Films with Ratings and Categories


-1- Off-beat Action Films with Substance, Style, and a Sense of Ironic Humor
  • **** Inglourious Basterds
  • **** Burn After Reading
  • **** Hot Fuzz
  • ***** Kill Bill Volume I & II
  • *** Face Off
  • ****** Lock Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
  • ***** Snatch
  • ***** Django Unchained
  • ***** Reservoir Dogs
  • ******* Pulp Fiction
  • ******* Heat
  • *** Oceans Twelve
  • *** Be Cool
  • ***** The Town
  • **** Kick Ass
  • *** BlackkKlansmen
  • *** Baby Driver
  • ***** Villainess
-2- Films Based on Historical Periods, Often Hard-Hitting
  • ******* Waltz With Bashir
  • ******* It’s Such a Beautiful Day
  • ***** Argo
  • ******* Persepolis
  • ****** Gomorrah
  • ****** Sicario
  • ***** Battle of Chernobyl
  • **** The Prophet
-3- Experimental Short Films
  • ******* Ryan (Short)
  • ****** Crumb
  • *** I Sisyphus (Short)
  • **** I Met The Walrus (Short)
  • *** An Andalusian Dog
-4- Documentaries on Social Phenomena
  • **** Religilous
  • ***** Kedi
  • ****** Why We Fight
  • **** Hitler: The Rise of Evil
  • *** God Grew Tired of Us
  • ****** Doctor’s Diaries
  • ****** Prohibition
  • ***** Manufacturing Consent: Noam Chomsky and the Media (1992)
  • ******* Shake Hands With The Devil
  • ******* The War You Don’t See
  • **** Sicko
  • ***** Inside Job
  • ****** Spotlight
  • ***** Merchants of Doubt
  • ***** Minecraft: The Story of Mojang
  • ****** Food Inc
  • ****** The Big Short
  • **** Food Matters
  • *** Super Size Me
  • **** Jesus Camp
  • *** A Better Life
  • ***** Catfish
  • ***** Das Boot
-5- Documentaries About Inspiring Performers, Mostly Musicians
  • **** Live! Tonight! Sold Out!!
  • *** Live At Reading
  • ******* The Devil And Daniel Johnston
  • ****** About a Son
  • ****** Cobain: Montage of Heck
  • ***** John Lennon Vs US
  • ******* Man on Wire
  • **** A Hard Day’s Night
  • ***** 8 Mile
-6- The Best of Psychological Thrillers
  • ******* Se7en

  • ***** Mystic River

  • **** 21 Grams

  • ****** Memento
  • **** John Wick

  • ***** Get Out

  • **** Hercules
  • ****** Pinocchio

  • **** Source Code

  • **** Jaws
  • ***** Topgun

  • **** Creed

  • ******* The Wrestler
  • **** The Fighter
-18- Non-Traditional Westerns
  • **** Space Cowboys
  • ******* No Country for Old Men
  • ***** True Grit
  • ****** The Hateful Eight
  • **** Dead Man
  • ***** Gran Torino

  • ******* Children of Men
  • **** 28 Days Later
  • ***** Contagion
  • ******* The Hurt Locker
  • ****** Blood Diamond
-21- Mystery with Interwoven Plot Twists
  • ******* Inside Man
  • ****** The Usual Suspects
-22- Films Built Around Excellent Characters
  • **** Few Good Men
  • **** Hacksaw Ridge
  • ****** The Terminal
  • ***** Sully

  • ****** Ida
  • **** The Shawshank Redemption
  • ***** Dolemite is My Name
-23- Classic Films

Classic films. These are paced slower (exception Hitchcock), avant-garde and not for everyone.

  • *** Eraserhead
  • ***** Stranger than Paradise
  • *** Teorema
  • ***** Mister Lonely
  • ***** Last Year at Marienbad
  • ******* Hiroshima Mon Amour
  • ***** 2001: A Space Odyssey
  • **** The Cabinet of Dr Caligari
  • ****** Psycho
  • **** Vertigo
  • **** Amor Estranho Amor
  • ******* The Tenant
-24- Mainstream Classics

Mainstream classics. Good to have in your vocabulary if you’re a film buff, good for igniting nostalgia.

  • ******* Strangers On A Train
  • ****** Dr Strangelove
  • **** It’s a Wonderful Life
  • ***** Stagecoach
  • **** Arsenic and Old Lace
  • ***** Casablanca
  • **** A Streetcar Named Desire
  • *** Saturday Night Fever
  • ******* Citizen Kane
  • **** In a Lonely Place
  • ****** Lolita
-25- Psychological Thrillers on Dark Human Themes

Psychological thrillers dealing with darker aspects of the human condition (drug use, self-identity, abuse).

  • ***** Boy A
  • **** Mysterious Skin
  • ****** Trainspotting
  • ****** My Beautiful Laundrette
  • *** The Girl Next Door
  • ******* Requiem for a Dream
  • ***** A Simple Plan
  • ******* Boys Don’t Cry
  • ******* Starred Up
  • ***** Black Swan
  • ****** Boyhood
  • ***** Kids
  • *** Irréversible
-26- Dark Psychological Thrillers, Male-Centric

Well-made, classic, extremely entertaining psychological thrillers with dark subject matter, centered around male characters.

  • ******* Fight Club
  • ******* A Clockwork Orange
  • ***** American History X
  • ***** Bad Boys
  • ***** Cool Hand Luke
-27- Action Films with Sci-Fi Roots

Great action films with science fiction roots, plenty of suspense and entertainment. Well-constructed, original mise-en-scene.

  • ***** District 9
  • ***** Arrival
  • ****** Predator
  • **** Contact
  • ******* Alien
  • **** Prometheus
  • **** Aliens
  • ***** Jurassic Park
  • **** A Quiet Place
-28- Off-Beat, Original Human Dramas

Slightly off-beat, highly original human drama. Slow-paced, but rich in both production and entertainment value.

  • ***** Magnolia
  • ****** 500 Days of Summer
  • ****** Silver Linings Playbook
  • **** I’m Here (Short)
  • **** K-pax
  • **** Kontroll
  • **** The Squid and the Whale
  • ***** Little Miss Sunshine
  • ****** Amelie
  • **** Doubt
  • **** Up in the Air
  • **** Palindromes
  • ****** Y Tu Mama Tambien
  • ***** Wristcutters: A Love Story
  • ****** Taxi Driver
  • ****** The Grand Budapest Hotel
  • ***** Moonrise Kingdom
  • **** Beginners
  • ***** Hunt for the Wilderpeople
  • *** I Heart Huckabees
  • ***** Cleo from 5 to 7
  • ******* One Flew Over The Cuckoo’s Nest
  • **** Happiness
  • ***** Shame
  • **** Life During Wartime
  • **** American Beauty
  • ***** Rain Man
  • ****** Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
  • **** The Florida Project
  • *** The Big Sick
  • ***** Call Me by Your Name
  • *** La La Land
  • ******* In the Mood for Love
  • **** Chungking Express
-29- Quintessential Psychological Thrillers

Quintessential psychological thrillers. High entertainment value, with seminal performances by many great actors.

  • ***** The Machinist
  • ****** The Shining
  • ****** Shutter Island
  • ****** Primal Fear
  • ***** Donnie Darko
  • **** The Butterfly Effect
  • ****** Being John Malkovich
  • ****** The Departed
  • ***** The Prestige
  • ***** V for Vendetta
  • ***** Killing of a Sacred Deer
-30- Slow-Paced Suburban Dramas

Slow-paced drama about suburban life, usually with a good message. Interesting plots.

  • **** Stand By Me
  • ***** Pleasantville
  • **** To Die For
  • **** Baby It’s You
-31- Excellent Script-Driven Dramas

Excellent scripts, drama, and high-entertainment value. I might merge this with category 22 in the near future.

  • **** The Illusionist
  • ****** A Beautiful Mind
  • ****** The Theory of Everything
  • ****** The Imitation Game
  • ***** The Sixth Sense
  • ****** Pi
  • ******* Good Will Hunting
  • ***** The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
-32- American Films with Quick-Witted Protagonists

Very ‘American’ films. Watch these for their quick-witted protagonists, con artists, thieves and coming-of-age themes.

  • ***** The Truman Show
  • *** Boiler Room
  • ***** Reality Bites
  • ****** Risky Business
  • **** Rounders
  • ******* Catch Me If You Can
  • ****** Bridge of Spies
  • **** House of Games
  • ***** Matchstick Men
  • ***** Blow Out
-33- Tim Burton Films

Tim Burton.

  • ***** Nightmare Before Christmas
  • **** Ed Wood
  • **** Sweeney Todd
-34- American Gangster and Crime Dramas

American Gangster and crime dramas. Classically entertaining and technically excellent films.

  • **** Scarface
  • ******* Goodfellas
  • ****** Once Upon a Time in America
  • ******* Godfather I-II
  • **** Donnie Brasco
  • ****** The Irishman
-35- Beautiful Documentaries on Exotic Phenomena

Beautiful documentaries about exotic phenomena. Watch for intellectual interest.

  • ***** Hubble 3D
  • ****** Helvetica
  • **** Ant Attack BBC
-36- Avant-Garde Animated Films

Avant-garde animated films with themes of nihilism, psychopathology, and the nature of human existence.

  • ****** Rejected Cartoons
  • ****** Rejected
  • ****** It’s Such a Beautiful Day
  • ****** Everything Will Be OK
  • ***** Salad Fingers
  • **** Upstream Color
  • ***** The Tree of Life
